body:
• Nebula

    •         New shop items, subject to change
            TDM added to rotations once again
            Categorized servers (to an extent)
            Explosion gadgets at end of game! :D
    So I was checking through the old discussions and found this (^~^) I was wondering if this has been or will be added (or what it is)

title: Explosion gadgets?!

replies.body: TDM is in the rotations. Explosion gadgets were implemented during beta testing of avicore, but caused too much lag.
replies.body_tagged: TDM is in the rotations. Explosion gadgets were implemented during beta testing of avicore, but caused too much lag.

replies.body: Okayy, what were they like and what did they do? And I already knew about new shop items, TDM etcetera I just worded the question wrong .-.
replies.body_tagged: Okayy, what were they like and what did they do? And I already knew about new shop items, TDM etcetera I just worded the question wrong .-.

replies.body: They were pretty amazingly destructive. I might have a video somewhere.
